title: Tobias and the Angel

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on canvas.

inscriptions: Inscribed, lower left: J. C. Cazin 1878

exhibition_history:
Southampton, New York, Parrish Art Museum, In Support of Liberty: European Paintings at the 1883 Pedestal Fund Art Loan Exhibition, June 29–September 1, 1986, no. 11; New York, National Academy of Design, September 18–December 7, 1986.

provenance_text: Henry Field (died 1890), Chicago; his widow Mrs. Florence Lathrop Field; given to the Art Institute, 1894.
